item.content:encoded:
Funeral Jesus Divine Mercy Prayer Sympathy Cards

Hot Deals! Funeral Jesus Divine Mercy Prayer Sympathy Cards – Sympathy Cards Popular Funeral Jesus Divine Mercy Prayer Sympathy Cards It’s a great choice Funeral Jesus Divine Mercy Prayer Sympathy Cards You can order it Divine Remembrance: Jesus and the Divine Mercy Funeral Prayer Card

In honor of your beloved departed, we present our exquisite Jesus and the Divine Mercy Funeral Prayer Card. This sacred token encapsulates the boundless compassion and mercy of the Divine, offering solace and strength during times of mourning.

Embrace Divine Comfort: Amidst the depths of sorrow, find solace in the unwavering love of Jesus and the Divine Mercy. Our prayer card serves as a beacon of hope, radiating divine comfort and assurance to grieving hearts seeking solace and peace.

Empowering Chaplet of the Divine Mercy Prayer: Discover on the reverse side the powerful Chaplet of the Divine Mercy prayer, a profound invocation of divine mercy and forgiveness. This sacred prayer uplifts the soul, guiding the departed towards eternal light and grace, and offering solace to those left behind.

Personalized Tribute: Each card provides a sacred space for personalization, allowing you to honor your cherished departed with the inscription "In Loving Memory of [Your Loved One’s Name]". A heartfelt gesture ensuring their memory is forever cherished in our hearts.

Jesus and the Divine Mercy: Source of Compassion and Grace: Jesus, the embodiment of divine love and mercy, offers solace and redemption to all who seek His embrace. His boundless compassion and forgiveness inspire us to extend the same grace and love to others.

Gift of Grace: Extend the gift of grace and divine consolation to those in mourning with our Jesus and the Divine Mercy Funeral Prayer Card. A tangible expression of love and support, this sacred keepsake serves as a beacon of hope, guiding souls towards healing and peace.

Illuminate Their Journey: As you gather to bid farewell to your beloved departed, let the divine light of Jesus and the Divine Mercy illuminate their journey into eternal peace and serenity. May this prayer card serve as a symbol of everlasting love and remembrance, guiding their soul towards eternal grace.

Embrace the boundless mercy and love of Jesus and the Divine Mercy with our Funeral Prayer Card â€“ a testament to the eternal bond we share with those who have touched our lives with divine grace and compassion. Price:$29.00
